biotools.summary: Assign functional annotations to fungal genes or proteins. Based on different classification methods like FunCat (Functional Catalogue), GO (Gene Ontology) and KEGG (Kyoto Encyclopedia of Genes and Genomes), it categorizes genes and proteins for fungal species on different levels and conducts an enrichment analysis.
